enum: rejected - ship from location not available
acknowledgement_status.description:
Status to let Jet know whether you accept or reject the order, errors that occur at the item level should be given the status 'rejected - item level error' 

            #Valid Values

            *'accepted' - All items in the order will be shipped' 

            *'rejected - unfulfillable address' - The address requested cannot be shipped to

            *'rejected - shipping method not supported' - The address requested cannot be shipped to

            *'rejected - ship from location not available' - The ship to location is invalid

            *'rejected - item level error' - The error occurred at the item level

alt_order_id.description: Optional merchant supplied order ID.  Jet will map this ID to Jet's order_id and you can then use this ID in subsequent messages relating to this order.

order_item_acknowledgement_status.description:
Value to send Jet the status of each item in the order request 

                    #Valid Values

                    *'fulfillable' - the item in the order can be shipped' 

                    *'nonfulfillable - no inventory' - No inventory for this product is available

                    *'nonfulfillable - invalid merchant SKU' - This is not recognized as a valid value

order_item_id.description: Jet's unique identifier for an item in a merchant order

alt_order_item_id.description: Optional seller supplied ID for an item in an order.  If this value is specified with the Jet's order_item_id, Jet will map the two IDs and you can then use your own order item ID for subsequent feeds relating to that order item.

shipment_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given shipment

alt_shipment_id.description: Optional merchant supplied shipment ID.  Jet will map this ID to the Jet's shipment_id and you can then use this ID in subsequent messages relating to this shipment.

merchant_sku.description: Merchant's unique identifier for a product

shipment_item_id.description: Jet's unique identifier for an item in a shipment

alt_shipment_item_id.description: Optional seller supplied ID for an item in a specific shipment.  If this value is specified with Jet's shipment_item_id, Jet will map the two IDs and you can then use your own shipment item ID for subsequent feeds relating to that order item.
